column4: hey guys big noob here anyone can help me with wireless setings?
cant get my card to run on ubuntu?
what card? in a lappy or desktop?
desktop a dwl-g520 with atheros chipset
during the instalation the card is recognised and im prompted to enter wep and other information
but after the install the card isnt there anymore -_-
do a google for "atheros wireless ubuntu" . I googled for my wireless on my lappy (broadcom in a presario) and i found the howto in just a few minutes...
i will try for the 100th time lol
lol...ok l'll give it a go... do u have network manager installed?
no, got ubuntu server
ok. u said the card disapeared?
really strange iwconfig doesnt list the card, even tho it was there at install
yeah
u using ndiswrapper?
i dont know, just the fresh install from the server version of ubuntu
I'm no expert, but i would try using ndiswrapper and the windows driver, unless your googleing has pointed you to an open sourced driver, that works.
as far as iv read its supposed to work of the bat
but ppl usually have problem if the have wep enabeled
as i do
tho they all seem to have diff solutions (which dont work for me) and some just dont work
then I'll stop trying to help. mine was a major PITA. Yours sounds too easy...
yes
I even read that mine didnt work at all in any flavor...
